"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import AnimalCard from "../../components/AnimalCard/AnimalCard" import "./Home.css" const Home = () => { const [featuredAnimals, setFeaturedAnimals] = useState([]) const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalAnimals: 0, adopted: 0, available: 0, }) useEffect(() => { // Simular carregamento de dados // Em produção, fazer chamada para API const mockAnimals = [ { id: 1, name: "Luna", age: "2 anos", breed: "Dachshund", size: "Pequeno", image: "https://hebbkx1anhila5yf.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/luna.jpg-YeOhCDibxlR6dtxDcB3NL8gUqcLwwx.jpeg", location: "São Paulo, SP", vaccinated: true, neutered: true, microchipped: true, }, { id: 2, name: "Max", age: "3 anos", breed: "Golden Retriever", size: "Grande", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552053831-71594a27632d?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", location: "Rio de Janeiro, RJ", vaccinated: true, neutered: false, microchipped: true, }, { id: 3, name: "Bella", age: "1 ano", breed: "Border Collie", size: "Médio", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551717743-4995b6ee9643?w=400&h=300&fit=crop", location: "São Paulo, SP", vaccinated: true, neutered: true, microchipped: false, }, ] setFeaturedAnimals(mockAnimals) setStats({ totalAnimals: 156, adopted: 89, available: 67, }) }, []) return (
{/* Hero Section */}

) } export default Home
